name: Mobility SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a finding that is NOT a blood pressure, body weight ,height measurement, or temperature finding. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Finding' subset with subset original id 6001000000138; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Finding simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999001551000000100.
